name: Dream-Space Convergence
text: Once per turn, after any player activates a system that contains one of your nexus tokens and 1 or more of your units, you may either gain 1 command token or move 1 ship from an adjacent system into that system. Other players treat systems that contain nexus tokens as nebulas.

name: Resonance Drive
text: During movement, apply +1 to the move value of your ships that are transporting units equal to their capacity value.

name: From Fire, Resolve
text: After you roll for your infantry's text ability, if the roll does not succeed, you may exhaust this card to treat it as a success instead. Infantry you place in combat using your Pheonix Rising ability gain +1 to their combat rolls for the rest of combat.

name: Foundry Network
text: When producing mechs, you may place them at any of your space docks. You do not need to have a mech on a planet when you resolve exploration cards requiring them.

name: Extraction
text: ACTION: You may exhaust this card, or spend 1 token from your strategy pool, to detach a Design from a planet that has one and reattach it to any other planet you control in an adjacent system that does not already have a Design attached to it. Then, ready that planet.

name: Disruption
text: When you activate a system, or a system that contains 1 or more of your units is activated: You may choose 1 unit ability, that unit ability cannot be used during this tactical action. You may treat compromised structures as if they were yours for the purposes of scoring objectives.
